title: Online Flipped Learning-Based Design Education Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Visual Communication Competency Enhancement Course for Current Science Field Practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain design principles (color, layout, typography) with over 80% accuracy through instructor-created videos in an online flipped environment
Learners can independently design and implement science data visualization projects by applying pre-learned theories
Learners can improve design deliverables at least twice through peer feedback processes using real-time collaboration tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
